refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: paraminspector opens the given parameter file or starts with an empty file. It is displayed as a table where you can add or remove lines and change the content.

This is a standalone version of the object inspector used in tuchulcha. Using its metadata file classes.wrp it is possible to display the parameter file content as it would look like in tuchulcha including default values and documentation tooltips.
